      • getPlay

        public int getPlay(java.lang.String input,
                   int player)
        Gets the next move for the next playe and determines if that move is a winning move or not.
        Parameters:
        input - The input from player / computer
        player - The player that is making the play. 1 = Player1, 2 = Player 2, 3 = Computer
        Returns:
        A value that says if the move was a winning move or not.

      • getHumanWins

        public int getHumanWins(int player)
        Returns the number of games won by a human player.
        Parameters:
        player - The number of the player for whom to fetch the number of wins.
        Returns:
        The number of human wins for either human player, as determined by the input parameter.
